fields.summary: Windows Phone : Prevent font size changes on system font size change

comments.body: Hello, This should be a default behavior. When you change the font size in system, the apps will change font size accordingly. Can you share a screenshot of the issue that is happening in Windows platform and how this viewed in iOS and Android platforms?Thanks.
